REF_FAO_PSA_FIP: GIS expertises, data management, tools development & map production in several projects: FIGIS, EU projects (D4Science, iMarine), Vulnerable Marine Ecosystems (VME) database, SmartFish Chimaera portal and FIRMS
REF_FAO_PSA_ESS: Development of a GIS tool with the R software to produce thematic statistical maps for the FAO Statistical yearbooks (starting from the 2012 edition). The software is exploited at report generation time using LaTeX tools. See http://www.fao.org/economic/ess/ess-publications/ess-yearbook/en
REF_UMANIS_2014_S3E: Integrating coastal indicators for the EC Water Framework Directive in the SEEE information systemâ€‹: R expertise (Technical conception & implementation). Audit of the existing SEEE information system & recommendations for its exploitation with coastal data & resulting indicators
REF_UMANIS_2015_R: R expertise for the Ifremer Dyneco/Vigies service: Optimization of codes, Automation & Standardization of processings including statistical analyses such as Dynamic Linear Models
REF_IFREMER_2016_DCSMM_FOND: Development of a R standard and generic library (DCSMM.D10) to convert datasets in Quadrige2 exchange format (QUADRILABO). Application to marine litter macro waste data from on-board data entry sofware (Allegro / TUTTI). Work carried out as part of the Marine Strategy Framework Directive.
REF_IFREMER_2016_DCSMM_FLOT: Development of a conversion interactive tool (Microsoft Access - VBA) to convert datasets from the MEGASCOPE database in QUADRILABO exchange format for integration in Quadrige2. Application to Floating wastes data. Work carried out as part of the Marine Strategy Framework Directive.
REF_IFREMER_2017_DCSMM_FOND: Improving development of DCSMM data integration R library (DCSMM.D10) for integrating recovery and historical data series of marine litter macro waste data in Quadrige2. Work carried out as part of the Marine Strategy Framework Directive.
REF_IFREMER_2017_DCSMM_FLOT: Improving development of DSCSMM data integration R library (DCSMM.D10) for integrating heterogenous datasets on marine floating wastes in Quadrige2. Work carried out as part of the Marine Strategy Framework Directive.
